member.name: T:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTag
member.summary: A class that provides the information about an animation tag for an .

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTag.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the animation.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTag.From
member.summary: Gets the starting frame of the animation.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTag.To
member.summary: Gets the ending frame of the animation.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTag.Color
member.summary: Gets the color of the animation as defined as the tag color in Asperite.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTag.Direction
member.summary: A value that indicates the direction the animation is played in. 0 = Forward, 1 = Reverse, 2 = Ping Pong.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTag.IsOneShot
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the animation tag is a one-shot animation, meaning that when it finished playing, it should stop animation on the last frame and not loop.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTag.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.name: T:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTagDirection
member.summary: Values that define the direction in which a the animation defined by an should be played.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTagDirection.Forward
member.summary: The animation shoudl be played in a forward direction from the starting frame to the ending frame.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTagDirection.Reverse
member.summary: The aniamtion should be played in a reverse direction from the ending frame to the starting frame.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTagDirection.PingPing
member.summary: The animation should ping pong the direciton played; First it should play forward from the starting frame to the ending frame, then it should play in reverse from the ending frame to the starting frame.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Documents.AsepriteTagDirection.OneShot
member.summary: The animation should only play from the starting frame to the ending frame and the stop animation on the ending frame.

member.name: T:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite
member.summary: An animated sprite class used to define, mange, and rendering sprite animations based on a single spritesheet.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Animations
member.summary: Gets the key-value collection of instances used by this animated sprite. The name of the animation is the key for the dictionary.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Frames
member.summary: Gets the collection of instances for this animated sprite.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Slices
member.summary: Gets the key-value collection of instances for this animated sprite.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.CurrentAnimation
member.summary: Gets the current that is being played.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.CurrentFrame
member.summary: Gets the current in the animation that is being rendered.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.CurrentFrameIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of current in the animation that is being rendered. This is the index of the frame in the propery.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.FrameTimer
member.summary: Gets the amount of time, in seconds, that is left to display the current frame in the current animation.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Animating
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if this instance is currently playing an animation.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Paused
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the current animation is in a paused state, meaning it will not advance to the next frame until unpaused

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Width
member.summary: Gets the width, in pixels.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Height
member.summary: Gets the height, in pixels.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.OnFrameBegin
member.summary: Gets or Sets an action to invoke at the beginning of each frame in an animation.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.OnFrameEnd
member.summary: Gets or Sets an action to invoke at the end of each frame in an animation.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.OnAnimationLoop
member.summary: Gets or Sets an action to invoke each time an animation loops.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.OnAnimationEnd
member.summary: Gets or Sets an action to invoke when an animation ends.
member.remarks: This action will only be called at the end of one-shot animations, or if is called manually.

member.summary: Creates a new instance.
member.param: A Texture2D that is the spritesheet containing all frames of all animations that will be rendered.

member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.summary: Updates this instance.
member.param: The amount of time, in seconds, that have passed since the last update. Usually gathered from GameTime.ElapsedTime.TotalSeconds

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.AdvanceFrame
member.summary: Advances the animation by one frame.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.ForwardAnimationLoopCheck
member.summary: Handles the logic for looping an animation that is animating in a foward direciton.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.ReverseAnimationLoopCheck
member.summary: Handles the logic for looping an animation that is animating in a reverse direction.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.PingPongAnimationLoopCheck
member.summary: Handls the logic for looping an animation that is ping-pong animating.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Render(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch)
member.summary: Renders to the screen

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.CenterOrigin
member.summary: Centers the origin of the rendered animation.
member.remarks: When using this for AnimatedSprite, all frames are assumed to be the same width and height, so the current frame bounds is used for the center origin calculation.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Play(System.String)
member.summary: Given the name of an animation, sets that animation as the current animation to play and starts it.
member.param: The name of the animation to play.
member.exception: Thrown if there is no animation exists with the name given in

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Pause(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pauses the current playing animation.
member.param: When true, resets the remaining time of the frame that is paused on to the full duratoin of the frame.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Unpause(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Unpauses the current playing animation.
member.param: When true, advances the current animation to the next frame in the animation.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.Stop
member.summary: Stops this animated sprite from animating on the current frame in the animation.

member.summary: Gets the defined color of the slice with the given name
member.param: The name of the slice
member.exception: Thrown if no instance exists with the name given in

member.summary: Get the Rectangle definition of the slice at the current frame of animation, if there is a slice key defined for the frame
member.param: The name of the slice
member.returns: A Rectangle definition of the frame slice, at the xy-coordinate of this sprite. If no slice key exists for the current frame, null is returned.
member.exception: Thrown if the slice name provided does not exist in the animation definitions slice dictionary

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimatedSprite.AddAnimation(MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation)
member.summary: Adds the given to the animations dictionary
member.param: The to add
member.remarks: Animations are stored in the dictionary by name, so each animation must have a unique name
member.exception: Thrown if the animation provided has a name that is already present in the animation dictionary

member.name: T:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation
member.summary: Represents the definition of an animation

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation.Name
member.summary: The name of this animation.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation.From
member.summary: The index of the frame that this animation starts on. The starting frame

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation.To
member.summary: The index of the frame that this animation ends on.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation.Direction
member.summary: The direciton in which the animation loops through its frames.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation.IsOneShot
member.summary: A value indicating if the animation is a one-shot animation, meaning that when it finished playing, it should stop animation on the last frame and not loop.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new structure with a forward animation direction.
member.param: The name of this animation.
The index of the frame that this animation starts on.
The index of the frame that this animation ends on.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimationLoopDirection)
member.summary: Creates a new structure
member.param: The name of this animation.
The index of the frame that this animation starts on.
The index of the frame that this animation ends on.
The direction in which the animation loops through its frames.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Animation.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimationLoopDirection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new structure
member.param: The name of this animation.
The index of the frame that this animation starts on.
The index of the frame that this animation ends on.
The direction in which the animation loops through its frames.
A value indicating if the animation should only play once and not loop.

member.name: T:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimationLoopDirection
member.summary: Provides a value that indicates the direciton in which an animation should loop through its frames.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimationLoopDirection.Forward
member.summary: Describes an animation that plays in a forward direction from the starting frame to the ending frame.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimationLoopDirection.Reverse
member.summary: Describes an animation that plays in a reverse direction from the ending frame to the starting frame.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.AnimationLoopDirection.PingPong
member.summary: Describes an animation that plays first in a forward direction from the starting frame to the ending frame, then plays in a reverse direction from the ending frame to the starting frame.

member.name: T:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Frame
member.summary: A frame is the rectangluar area within the spritesheet that describes a single frame of an animation and the duration in which that frame should be rendered.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Frame.Bounds
member.summary: Defines the rectanglular bounds within the spritesheet that should be. rendered for for this frame.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Frame.Duration
member.summary: The amount of time, in seconds, this frame should be displayed.

Creates a new instance.
The top-left x-coordinate position of the frame relative to the spritesheet. a
The top-left y-coordinate position of the frame relative to the spritesheet.

The amount of time, in seconds, the frame should be displayed.

member.name: T:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite
member.summary: Simple sprite classed used for managing and rendering a Texture2D

member.summary: Gets the Texture2D used when rendering.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.Position
member.summary: Gets or Sets the top-left xy-coordinate position.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the top-left x-coordinate position of the sprite.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.Y
member.summary: Gets or Sets the top-left y-coordinate position of the sprite.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.Width
member.summary: Gets the width, in pixels.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.Height
member.summary: Gets the height, in pixels.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.SourceRectangle
member.summary: Gets or Sets the bounds of the source rectangle to use when rendering. Defines the area within the that is rendered.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.Color
member.summary: Gets or Sets the color mask to use when rendering.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or Sets the amount of rotation to apply when rendering.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.Origin
member.summary: Gets or Sets the xy-coordinate to use as the origin point when rendering.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.Graphics.Sprite.Scale
member.summary: Gets or Sets the x and y scale values too apply when rendering.

member.summary: Gets or sets the SpriteEffects to use when rendering.
